alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Ventura County Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 09 at 2:03PM PST until March 11 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THURSDAY TO 3 PM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. Strongest from Oxnard to Malibu. * WHERE...Ventura County Coast and Los Angeles County Coast. * WHEN...From 7 PM Thursday to 3 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Ventura County Coast
